entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 1.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
